name: Digimon Rumble Academy: Bota Busters Bunch
name_original: Digimon Rumble Academy: Bota Busters Bunch
description:
It's club recruitment day!

Jesuko and company must gather more students in order to make their club official!

Little does Jesu know, there's more to making a club than just for the fun of it!

But wait-- where's the club leader?!

This visual novel is an excerpt of a later episode in a series of visual novels known as "Digimon Rumble Academy".  This game is free and it is encouraged that you play this game in one sitting due to saving issues.

More information on Digimon Rumble Academy can be found here.
